_header: Saint Wulfstan of Worcester was here of England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Wulfstan, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Wulfstan in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Vor þulke þat þe kyng to truste failed he wel
                    uasteSo þat he was bineþe icaste & ouercome ace
                    laste…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Vor him me may al day þere mony vair miracle iseNou god
                    leue þat we mote wiþ him in þe Ioie of heuene be

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint Wolston bysschop of Wirecestre was her in ingelondeswyþe
                    holy man was alle his lyf as ich ondirstonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& brynge vs to þat ilke ioye þer he is inne I
                    brouȝteIesus for þat ilke loue þat þu vs so dere
                    abouȝte

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Wolston Bisschop of Wircestre was her of EngelondeSwiþe
                    holi mon al his lyf as ich vndurstonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor him me may al day þere Mony feir Miracle i seoNow
                    God leeue þat we mote wiþ him in þe ioye of heuene beo
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Wolston bischop of Wyrecestre was here of engelondeSwiþe
                    holi man he was al is lif ase ich me vnderstonde…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þare man may for is holie bodi mani fair miracle i
                    seoNou god graunti þat we mote with him in þe Ioye of heouene
                    beo
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 70-7.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Wolston bisshop of WircestreWas here in
                    EngelondeSwyþe holyman al his lyfAs I
                    vnderstonde…
BodLauMis463.Note: Written in half-lines because in two columns.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Wolston bischop of Wircester was here in IngelondAn holi man
                    in al his lyf he was as I understond…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…ffor him men moun þere alday manye meraclis seNow god
                    ȝeue þat we mote for him in heuen þe betere be

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
…[ ]þe holye man of lyue as ich vnder stondeWis[ ] he
                    was aȝens [ ]uld god lif he had ynow…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines: …Now god leue þat we mote wiþ him i heuene be
OxfCCC431.Note:
First line missing in this MS, as also penultimate, due to mutilation of
                    leaves.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Wustan bischope of Wircestre was þurgh goddeȝ
                    sandeA ful haly man he was als ȝe sal vndrestandeOf grete men
                    comen he was & borne in InglandeOf fairer vertus þen he was ay
                    lyfed none þen in lande…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…ffor his lofe men may ȝet þore many miracle seGode
                    graunte þat we may with him in þe Ioe of hevyn be

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Wolston bissop of Wirceter was her in engelondeSwyȝe
                    holyman al is lif was as ich vnder stonde…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…ffor him memay þer alday many fair miracle iseNou god
                    leone þat we mote wiþ hym In þe ioie of heuene be
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.8-15.

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
Saynt Wolstan bishop of Wircetir was thruȝ goddes sondA ful
                    holy man he was as ȝe may vnderstond…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…At Wircetyr ther he lys mony a miracle mon may seGod leue
                    that we may with him in the Ioye of heuen be

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Wolston of Wircestre bisschop was her in EngelondeSwiþe
                    holy man he was as ich haue vnderstonde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…ffor al day me may ffor him ffayr miracle y seoNow god
                    graunte þat we mote wiþ him in þe ioye of heuene beo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint Wolston byschop of Wyrcestre was in englondeSwyþe holy
                    man al his lif he was ic vnderstond…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…for hym me may þer al day many nyracle y seNou god lene
                    þat we mote in ioie of heuene be

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEynt wolston byssop of wircestre was here in
                    engelondeSuþþe holy man al is lyf was as y vnder
                    stonde…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…for him me may þer alday many faire myracle yseNou god
                    leue þat we mote wiþ him in þe ioy of heuene be

BLAru42.First Lines:
Whanne þe dede slep hym ouercome þat he myȝte langor
                    goneHis heued he wolde legge adoun vppon þe
                    hardeston…
BLAru42.Last Lines:
…ffor hym me may þer alday many fayre myracle y seNow
                    gode leue þat we mote with hym in þe ioye of heuene be
BLAru42.Note:
Missing lines 1-14. Folios are out of order; therefore text spans ff.
                    110 and 111, and 2. Missing lines 1-14. F. 111 is severely damaged.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn Wolston bischop of worcestre was here of ynglondswyþe holiman al lif he was ich vnderstonde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …for him me may al pay þere many vair miracle ysenow god leue þat we mote with him In þe Ioie of heuen be
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum iiii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 4).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Wolfston bischop of Wircestre was her in engelondSwiþe holi mon al his lif he was ich vnderstonde…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Þorw him me mai þer al day moni miracle seoNow god leue þat we moten in þe ioie of heuene beo

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Wolston þe busschop of Wyrcestre was here in engelondSwiþe holi man al is lif he was ich vndirstonde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …At Wircetre he is ychriuyd of him myracles may y seNou god lyue þat we mote wiþ him in þe ioye of heuene be

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Wolfstan bisshop of Wircester was þurȝ goddes
                    sondeA ful holy man he was as ȝe may vnderstonde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…At wyntre þere he his mony a myracle mon may seGod leve
                    þat we may with hym in þe ioye of heuen be

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Wolstan was bisshop of wirceter in EngelondA full holy man he
                    was as I vnderstond…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…For hym we may alday faire miracle seGod leue that we mote
                    with hym in ioye be Amen.
